Detailed Description

template<typename T = Row, typename Alloc = std::allocator<T>>
class storage::data::RowSet< T, Alloc >

A Row Result Set class. Holds list of rows fetched for given row defintion.

Member Function Documentation

◆ fetch()

template<typename T , typename Alloc >
db_result_t storage::data::RowSet< T, Alloc >::fetch ( db_cursor_t  cursor)
inline

Initializes Row set with fetched data.

Parameters
cursorCursor handle
Returns
  • DB_OK when successful.

  • DB_FAIL on failure.

    On failure, one of the following error codes is set:

    • DB_EINVAL Caused by: invalid cursor handle, invalid row handle.
    • DB_ENOTFOUND Cursor is not positioned on a row. No data was read.
Precondition
The cursor is positioned before the first row.
Postcondition
A transaction is active on database if the operation succeeds.
